data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Mjallby attack but David Lofquist's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 1, It's a goal kick for the home team in Uppsala.
Mjallby needs to be cautious. Sirius have an attacking throw-in.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Fredrik Klitte.
In the minute 2, Ball goes out of play for a Mjallby goal kick.
Fredrik Klitte awards Mjallby a goal kick.
Free kick for Mjallby in their own half.
In the minute 7, Free kick Mjallby.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sirius at Studenternas IP.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as Mjallby is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sirius in their own half.
Sirius drive upfield and Adam Hellborg gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Mjallby defender.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Sirius.
Sirius to take a throw-in in Mjallby territory.
Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Mjallby in their own half.
In the minute 16, Adam Hellborg of Sirius smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Mjallby in their own half.
In the minute 19, Sirius have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Mjallby.
At Studenternas IP, Mjallby are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 20, Mjallby awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Important block from the Mjallby defence as Tim Bjorkstrom fires in a strike for Sirius.
Goal kick for Mjallby at Studenternas IP.
In the minute 24, Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Sirius just outside Mjallby's area.
Elias Andersson for Sirius gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Mjallby have a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Jesper Gustavsson (Mjallby) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 28, Can Sirius get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mjallby's half?
Free kick for Mjallby in their own half.
Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Mjallby.
In the minute 29, Mjallby awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fredrik Klitte signals a Mjallby throw-in in Sirius's half.
Mjallby are pushing forward but Jesper Gustavsson's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 33, It's a goal kick for the home team in Uppsala.
Sirius are caught offside.
In Uppsala a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Mjallby close to the penalty box.
Fredrik Klitte signals a throw-in for Sirius, close to Mjallby's area.
Throw-in Mjallby.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Mjallby in the half of Sirius.
Mjallby have been awarded a corner by Fredrik Klitte.
Mjallby have been given a penalty at Studenternas IP...
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half is over at Studenternas IP.
In the minute 45, It's advantage Mjallby in Uppsala as Moses Ogbu scores from the spot to make it 0-1.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Ball goes out of play for a Mjallby goal kick.
Throw-in for Sirius in the half of Mjallby.
In the minute 49, Fredrik Klitte awards Mjallby a goal kick.
Fredrik Klitte awards the home team a throw-in.
Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Mjallby.
In the minute 53, Can Sirius capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Tim Bjorkstrom gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sirius.
Can Sirius get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mjallby's half?
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Mjallby at Studenternas IP.
Free kick for Mjallby in the half of Sirius.
Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Mjallby in their own half.
In the minute 56, In Uppsala a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Throw-in for Mjallby in the half of Sirius.
In the minute 59, Sirius's Mohammed Saeid gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Mjallby defender.
Mjallby are coming forward and Moses Ogbu gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Sirius have a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Free kick Sirius.
Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Mjallby.
Jamie Roche (Sirius) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Sirius in the half of Mjallby.
Jacob Bergstrom (Mjallby) gets booked by Fredrik Klitte, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Mjallby awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 65, Free kick in a good position for Sirius!
Mohammed Saeid (Sirius) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Mjallby at Studenternas IP.
Ball safe as Mjallby is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 67, Laorent Shabani is replacing Simon Gefvert for Sirius at Studenternas IP.
The home team have replaced Mohammed Saeid with Noel Hansson. This is the second substitution made today by Henrik Rydstrom.
In the minute 68, Mjallby have a dangerous throw-in.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Mjallby.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Sirius at Studenternas IP.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Mjallby in their own half.
In the minute 72, Erik Parsson is on a sub for Jacob Bergstrom for Mjallby.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Yukiya Sugita (Sirius) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Mjallby defenders.
In the minute 74, Sirius to take a throw-in in Mjallby territory.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Fredrik Klitte.
Sirius push forward at Studenternas IP and Yukiya Sugita gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Mjallby defence.
In the minute 75, Mjallby awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Mjallby.
Kadir Hodzic for Mjallby drives towards goal at Studenternas IP. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Mjallby in their own half.
The home team replace Adam Hellborg with Niklas Busch Thor.
In Uppsala, Tim Bjorkstrom of Sirius is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Sirius.
Fredrik Klitte signals a Sirius throw-in in Mjallby's half.
Important block from the Sirius defence as Erik Parsson fires in a strike for Mjallby.
In the minute 80, Throw-in high up the field for Sirius in Uppsala.
Elias Andersson of Sirius gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Mjallby goal kick.
In the minute 82, Fredrik Klitte awards Mjallby a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Uppsala.
Fredrik Klitte signals a Sirius throw-in in Mjallby's half.
In the minute 82, Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Mjallby in their own half.
Adam Petersson is replacing Jesper Gustavsson for the away team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Uppsala.
In the minute 84, Can Sirius capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Mjallby's half?
Mjallby needs to be cautious. Sirius have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Mjallby in their own half.
In the minute 85, In Uppsala a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Mjallby make their third substitution with Viktor Gustafson replacing David Lofquist.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Fredrik Klitte.
In the minute 87, Yukiya Sugita (Sirius) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Sirius.
Sirius's Noel Hansson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 87, Goal kick for Mjallby at Studenternas IP.
Fredrik Klitte awards the home team a throw-in.
Mjallby have a goal kick.
In the minute 89, Mjallby will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sirius.
Noel Hansson (Sirius) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Fredrik Klitte awards Mjallby a goal kick.
Throw-in Sirius.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Sirius.
Mjallby awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Uppsala a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Mjallby capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sirius's half?
Corner awarded to Sirius.
That's full-time at Studenternas IP. The final score is 0-1.
Laorent Shabani is booked for the home team.
